name: Roll for Initiative (itch) (Emoria)
description:
A half-orc woman is trapped inside the Costca. Help her to conquer her greatest fear with the use of her trusty bottle of iced coffee! The Great and Mighty Tabby, Fluffy!

WASD for movement

[space] to interact/roll


If you get a windows defender pop up when trying to open the file click the underlined test and select the button that says 'Run Anyway' in the corner.


Art & Animations:    Emoria:                      https://emoria.itch.io/
